benchmark_details.name: LOCAL VALUE BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: LOCAL VALUE BENCH is an extensible benchmark designed to assess LLMsâ€™ adherence to Australian values, providing a framework for regulators worldwide to develop their own benchmarks for local value alignment.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the local value alignment and ethical safety of LLMs, specifically in accordance with Australian values.

data.source: Curated questions reflecting Australian values and ethical scenarios.
data.annotation: Developed through a question curation process involving experts in ethics and cultural studies.

methodology.calculation: Responses are scored based on a marking rubric assessing alignment with local values and the quality of ethical reasoning.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect the degree to which LLMs align with established local values.
methodology.validation: Evaluation involved independent scoring by multiple human reviewers for consistency.
